name: ChatGPT
description: ChatGPT is a large-scale conversational AI developed by OpenAI. It excels at answering questions, generating content, writing code, analyzing text, and assisting with learning across a wide variety of domains. It supports multi-turn dialogue, memory, and deep reasoning capabilities.

name: GPT-4o mini
description: GPT-4o mini is a lightweight version of GPT-4o optimized for speed and cost efficiency. It is ideal for high-volume tasks such as chatbots, classification, summarization, and real-time interactive experiences.

name: Claude
description: Claude by Anthropic is an alignment-focused AI assistant known for safety, large context windows, and high-fidelity reasoning. It is widely used for research, writing, and complex decision-making tasks.

name: Claude 3 Sonnet
description: Claude 3 Sonnet is part of Anthropic’s Claude 3 family, offering strong reasoning abilities and enterprise-level accuracy. Ideal for summarization, analysis, and high-stakes workflows such as legal and financial tasks.

name: Google Gemini (formerly Bard)
description: Gemini is Google’s multimodal AI model supporting text, image, and code analysis. It integrates deeply with Google Search and Workspace, excelling at research, data extraction, and real-time answer generation.

name: Perplexity AI
description: Perplexity AI is an AI-powered research assistant that provides precise, citation-based answers. It is popular for fast information retrieval, fact checking, and academic-style exploration.

name: Midjourney
description: Midjourney generates high-quality artistic images from text prompts. Known for its stylistic richness, creativity, and aesthetic detail, it is widely used by designers, agencies, and creative artists.

name: DALL·E 3
description: DALL·E 3 produces hyper-accurate illustrations, realistic images, and stylized artwork from text instructions. It integrates deeply with ChatGPT, enabling iterative refinement.

name: Stable Diffusion
description: Stable Diffusion is an open-source image generation model enabling full customization, fine-tuning, and control over image workflows. It powers hundreds of third-party apps and creative tools.

name: Leonardo AI
description: Leonardo AI is a creative suite designed for generating production-ready assets including art, icons, textures, and 3D resources. It includes training, upscaling, and high-quality text-to-image pipelines.

name: Runway
description: Runway offers AI video editing, video generation, and VFX automation. It includes tools such as Gen-2 for transforming text prompts into short video clips, making it popular among filmmakers and marketers.

name: OpenAI Sora
description: Sora is OpenAI's advanced text-to-video model capable of generating realistic, coherent, and cinematic video sequences. It supports complex storytelling, physics-aware motion, and long sequences.

name: Pika Labs
description: Pika Labs is a generative video platform turning ideas and scripts into animated scenes. It specializes in stylized visuals and quick video drafts for marketing, advertising, and animation.

name: Synthesia
description: Synthesia creates AI videos featuring realistic avatars and voiceover narration. It is widely used for training videos, marketing content, and explainer videos without requiring cameras or microphones.

name: Otter.ai
description: Otter provides real-time meeting transcription, speaker identification, and automated summarization. It integrates with Zoom, Google Meet, and Microsoft Teams for collaborative workflows.

name: AssemblyAI
description: AssemblyAI offers enterprise-grade speech-to-text APIs with accuracy-optimized transcription, sentiment analysis, content moderation, and speech summarization capabilities.

name: Notion AI
description: Notion AI enhances documents and workspaces with automated summarization, content generation, task classification, and idea expansion. Integrated natively with Notion workspace.

name: Tability
description: Tability is an AI-powered OKR and goal-tracking platform that generates updates, insights, and action recommendations. Designed for teams, leaders, and project management workflows.

name: Murf
description: Murf is an AI voice generator providing realistic voiceovers for ads, presentations, podcasts, and e-learning material. It includes voice cloning, tonal control, and editing tools.

name: ElevenLabs
description: ElevenLabs is a leading AI voice synthesis platform enabling hyper-realistic voices, multilingual narration, voice cloning, and generative audio content production.

name: Copy.ai
description: Copy.ai helps teams generate marketing copy, landing pages, emails, and product descriptions. It includes automated workflows and templates for business writing.

name: Jasper
description: Jasper is an AI writing assistant tailored for marketing teams. It generates branded content, blogs, ads, and email campaigns with advanced tone control.

name: Replit Ghostwriter
description: Replit Ghostwriter provides real-time code suggestions, debugging help, and code explanations directly inside the Replit environment. Designed for developers and students.

name: Tabnine
description: Tabnine is an AI pair-programming assistant offering contextual code completion across major IDEs. It supports multiple languages and team-focused models.

name: GitHub Copilot
description: GitHub Copilot suggests code, functions, and debugging fixes using OpenAI models. It integrates into VS Code, JetBrains, and Neovim with high developer adoption.

name: Cursor AI
description: Cursor is an AI coding environment designed for full-project reasoning and multi-file refactoring. It is a preferred tool for AI-accelerated software development.

name: Tome
description: Tome transforms text prompts into visual presentations using AI-powered layout generation, image creation, and storytelling capabilities.

name: Gamma
description: Gamma is an AI-first presentation and document creation tool that builds clean visual decks and webpages without requiring design expertise.

name: Humata
description: Humata lets users upload documents and ask questions about them. It extracts meanings, summarizes long PDFs, and answers complex queries.

name: Fireflies.ai
description: Fireflies AI transcribes meetings, assigns tasks, identifies highlights, and automates meeting notes. Works with Zoom, Meet, Teams, and Slack.

name: Cogram
description: Cogram automatically generates meeting notes, summaries, and follow-up tasks. Designed for sales, engineering, and customer success teams.

name: Figma AI
description: Figma AI speeds up UI/UX workflows with automated layouts, copy generation, asset creation, and brainstorming tools inside Figma.

name: Kittl
description: Kittl is an AI-powered graphics tool enabling designers to quickly create logos, posters, illustrations, and typographic artworks.

name: LearningLab AI
description: LearningLab uses AI to personalize study plans, generate practice questions, create revision material, and track learning progress.

name: Quizlet Q-Chat
description: Quizlet Q-Chat acts as an AI tutor generating practice quizzes, flashcards, explanations, and interactive study conversations.

name: Runway Audio
description: Runway provides AI-based audio tools including sound isolation, background removal, voice enhancement, and generative effects.

name: AudioGen
description: AudioGen is a text-to-sound model that produces AI-generated sound effects, music layers, environmental ambience, and Foley sounds.

name: Browse AI
description: Browse AI is a no-code web scraping and monitoring tool that extracts data and tracks website changes using robotic process automation.

name: Zapier AI
description: Zapier AI automates workflows with natural-language actions, generating automations, integrations, and triggers across 6000+ apps.

name: Superhuman AI
description: Superhuman AI speeds up email writing, sorting, prioritization, and reply suggestions with enterprise-grade automation.

name: HeyGen
description: HeyGen creates AI avatar videos, auto-translates content into multiple languages, and syncs lip movements using realistic generation.

name: Adobe Firefly
description: Adobe Firefly adds generative image creation, background replacement, vector recoloring, and style transfer tools inside Adobe Creative Cloud.

name: Deepgram
description: Deepgram offers ASR (Automatic Speech Recognition) APIs optimized for speed, accuracy, and large-scale voice transcription projects.

name: Scribe AI
description: Scribe AI automatically records workflows and generates step-by-step documentation, complete with screenshots, instructions, and diagrams.

name: Resume.io AI
description: Resume.io uses AI to optimize resumes, create job-aligned bullet points, and format professional CVs with ATS-friendly templates.

name: Kickresume
description: Kickresume is an AI-powered resume, cover letter, and portfolio builder with templates designed for students, professionals, and managers.

name: PhotoRoom
description: PhotoRoom is a professional AI photo editing tool specializing in background removal, product photography, and image enhancement for ecommerce.

name: ImgCreator AI
description: ImgCreator AI creates illustrations, product shots, anime-style art, and social media graphics using advanced diffusion models.

name: Descript
description: Descript is a powerful AI video and audio editor offering overdub voice cloning, text-based editing, transcription, and multi-track editing.

name: ScribeConvert
description: ScribeConvert transforms uploaded PDFs and documents into structured summaries, Q&A, key insights, and learning notes.

name: Playground AI
description: Playground AI enables creative experimentation with image generation, filters, and AI editing tools for professional-quality artwork.

name: Genmo
description: Genmo generates animated videos, GIFs, and visual effects from text prompts. It supports motion editing and cinematic compositions.
